events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer position, including resume and portfolio links.
Application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering team for the backend developer role.
Recruiter John Smith was assigned to manage the application process for this candidate.
Initial phone screening completed, candidate showed strong knowledge in software development principles.
Candidate responded promptly and positively to invite for the technical interview, expressing enthusiasm.
Technical interview was scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM, with the lead developer as the interviewer.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating advanced coding and problem-solving skills.
HR interview scheduled for May 15th to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate expectations.
HR interview concluded positively, candidate expressed strong interest in joining the engineering team long-term.
An offer was extended outlining salary, benefits, and start date, with hopes for a positive candidate response.
Candidate provided feedback expressing excitement about the offer and requested minor clarifications.
Candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date for June 1st.
Onboarding process began smoothly with introductions, equipment setup, and training schedules arranged.
The hiring process was officially closed after successful integration of the candidate into the engineering team.
